page.title: 17A Day in the Life
page.content: {Sharon(cont)}All the juniors go in to the hall after registration for singing.At 10.15 we leave school to go to the swimming baths at Deyes High School.We get back just before 11.30 and do maths or English until 12.00. Lunch finishes at 1.20 then we have art and craft.Playtime is from 2.30_2.45,I usually play games with my friends.At 2.45 I go to a recorder lesson with Mrs Brankin.When school finishesat3.30 I stay behind until my Mum comes to collect Andrew and me.After tea I take Andrew to judo and return at 7.00 to collect him.I go to bed at 8.30." {Nichola}"On Sunday morning my family goes to church and I go to Sunday school. My favourite Sunday dinner is roast chicken,roast potatoes and sprouts.We usually visit my Gran in the afternoon and stay for tea.
